statement.p: Explain why the vectors \left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ -4 \\ -2 \\ 4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ 1 \\ -5 \\ 3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ 3 \\ 0 \\ 4 \end{array}\right] , \text{ and } \left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ -7 \\ 6 \\ 6 \end{array}\right] span or don't span \mathbb{R}^4.

answer.p: The vectors \left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ -4 \\ -2 \\ 4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ 1 \\ -5 \\ 3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ 3 \\ 0 \\ 4 \end{array}\right] , \text{ and } \left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ -7 \\ 6 \\ 6 \end{array}\right] do not span \mathbb{R}^4.
